title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1261.23 - Landing of helicopters without two-way radio restricted
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1261.23 - Landing of helicopters without two-way radio restricted

State Regulations

No helicopter may land or take-off at Port Authority
waterfront heliports unless it is equipped with a two-way radio capable of
transmitting and receiving 123.05 megacycles. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1261.23

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
